data.prayer: Father, help your children in Quindío, Colombia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Quindío, Colombia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Quindío.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Quindío.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Quindío, Colombia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Passe people. Make the Passe people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, make bold the prophets in Quindío, Colombia so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Quindío that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Quindío, Colombia has a population of 555,400.

We estimate Quindío has 59,602 people who might know Jesus, 460,101 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 35,697 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 59,602 believers in Quindío to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.
